00017 YClopsNavigationSystem2::YClopsNavigationSystem2(CConfigFile & config)
00018 : isGpsDataShown(false), isCompassDataShown(false), isLidarDataShown(false), isCameraDataShown(false), isEncoderDataShown(false)
00019 {
00020         this->motor = new DualMotorCommand();
00021         this->compass = new Compass( config );
00022         this->gps = new GPS();
00023 
00024         gps->setSerialPortName ( config.read_string("GPS", "COM_port_LIN", "/dev/ttyUSB1" ) );
00025         gps->loadConfig(config, "GPS");
00026         gps->initConfig(config, "GPS");
00027         gps->initialize();
00028 
00029         this->camera = new Camera();
00030         this->lidar = new CSickLaserSerial();
00031 
00032         this->lidar->setSerialPort("/dev/ttyUSB2");
00033         this->lidar->setBaudRate(38400);
00034         this->lidar->setScanFOV(180);
00035         this->lidar->setScanResolution(50);  // 25=0.25deg, 50=0.5deg, 100=1deg
00036         cout << "Initializing lidar" << endl;
00037         this->lidar->initialize(); // This will raise an exception on error
00038         cout << "Done init lidar" << endl;
00039 }

00041 YClopsNavigationSystem2::~YClopsNavigationSystem2() {
00042         delete this->motor;
00043         delete this->compass;
00044         delete this->gps;
00045         delete this->camera;
00046         this->lidar->turnOff();

00050 void YClopsNavigationSystem2::doProcess() {
00051         cout << "." << endl;
00052 
00053         this->motor->doProcess();
00054         this->compass->doProcess();
00055         this->gps->doProcess();
00056         this->camera->doProcess();
00057 
00058         if( this->isCompassDataShown ) {
00059                 this->compass->dumpData(cout);
00060         }
00061 
00062         if( this->isGpsDataShown ) {
00063                 this->gps->dumpData(cout);
00064         }
00065 
00066         if( this->isCameraDataShown ) {
00067                 this->camera->dumpData(cout);
00068         }
00069 
00070         if( this->isLidarDataShown ) {
00071 
00072                 static mrpt::gui::CDisplayWindowPlots           win("Laser scans");
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076                 bool                                            thereIsObservation,hardError;
00077                 CObservation2DRangeScan         obs;
00078 
00079                 try
00080                 {
00081                         this->lidar->doProcessSimple( thereIsObservation, obs, hardError );
00082                 }
00083                 catch (std::exception &e)
00084                 {
00085                         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00086                         hardError = true;
00087                 }
00088                 if (hardError)
00089                         printf("[TEST] Hardware error=true!!\n");
00090                 if (thereIsObservation)
00091                 {
00092                         printf("[TEST] Observation received (%u ranges over %.02fdeg, mid=%.03f)!!\n",
00093                                         (unsigned int)obs.scan.size(),
00094                                         RAD2DEG(obs.aperture),
00095                                         obs.scan[obs.scan.size()/2]);
00096                         obs.sensorPose = CPose3D(0,0,0);
00097                         mrpt::slam::CSimplePointsMap            theMap;
00098                         theMap.insertionOptions.minDistBetweenLaserPoints       = 0;
00099                         theMap.insertObservation( &obs );
00100 
00101                         vector_float    xs,ys,zs;
00102                         theMap.getAllPoints(xs,ys,zs);
00103                         win.plot(xs,ys,".b3");
00104                         win.axis_equal();
00105                 }
00106         }
00107 }

00141 void YClopsNavigationSystem2::useYclopsMotorCommand() {
00142         MotorCommandInterface * tmp = this->motor;
00143         this->motor = new MotorCommand();
00144         delete tmp;
00145 }

00153 void YClopsNavigationSystem2::useNullMotorCommand() {
